text: - Are you looking for the flexibility
to learn where and when you want

while still benefiting from
an Expert AWS Instructor?
(bright music)
AWS Digital Classroom Courses

give you the flexibility
of digital training
and the depth of classroom training
to build the in-demand cloud skills

and best practices to
innovate in the cloud.
AWS Digital Classroom Courses are based
on our current single

or multi-day expert-led AWS
Classroom Training Courses,

which are focused on
multiple integrated topics

to build solutions that
address organizational needs.

The courses are available
in a digital format,

so you can learn where and
when you want at your own pace
and still benefit

from an AWS Expert
Instructor, like myself.

This also makes it easier
to scale your business
by accelerating a team's ability

to gain a deep understanding
of focused topic areas
across large teams or regions.

Courses are made up of
instructor-led videos,
hands-on labs, demonstrations,
knowledge checks, assessments,
and some courses have Tech Talks
that you can revisit

to reinforce your learning
as much as you'd like,
whenever you'd like.
Get access to an entire catalog
of AWS Digital Classroom Courses
spanning multiple roles and solutions,
including solutions architect, developer,

DevOps engineer, machine
learning, security,
cloud operations, and more,

with the AWS Skill Builder
Individual annual subscription
or Team subscription.
(bright music fades)
